short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For world language class to sending messages, Easy Accent Marks is the simplest solution to type accent marks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From world language classes to sending messages, Easy Accent Marks is the simplest solution to effortlessly type accent marks. 

Simply click on an accent, and it is automatically copied and inserted to the built-in text area.

With this chrome extension, you have access to all the accent marks in these languages:

Czech
Dutch
German
Finnish
French
Hungarian
Icelandic
Italian
Norwegian
Polish
Portuguese
Romanian
Spanish
Swedish
Turkish
